resources.string: You have denied this app\'s access to external storage, so we cannot make occlusion cards for you.\n Please grant this permission manually at application settings page.\n

No access to ankidroid's API. You have to ensure that:
 You have Ankidroid installed.
 In the advanced settings of Ankidroid, You have "Enable Ankidroid API" checked.
 You have grant the permission "Read And Write Ankidroid Database" in this app' settings page.
